select_module:
Manage the appearance, functionality, and behavior of the bot using module settings. Modify the parameters to customize the bot to your needs.

Select a module to continue the configuration.

general.description:
Basic settings are parameters that allow you to change the general functionality and external characteristics of the bot. Modify the basic parameters to customize the operation of the bot to your needs and preferences.

Select the appropriate section for configuration.

server_language.name: Server Language
server_language.description:
**Server default language** is the main language of communication and interaction on the community server. This language is set as the default for all participants (except for participants who have forcibly changed the bot's language) to ensure common understanding and communication.

Setting the server default language allows to define the main language of communication and interaction on the server. This contributes to more effective communication and increases understanding among community members, creating a unified space for exchanging information and ideas.

system_color.description: **System Message Color** - this parameter will be used to display important system messages as embedded cards in the chat. This parameter helps highlight important messages and make them more noticeable to users. Choose a color that matches your style or helps better organize information in Discord chat. Change this parameter at your discretion to make your communication experience more convenient and aesthetic.

general.timezone: Standard server time zone displayed in the bot

clan.description:
Clan settings allow you to manage the appearance, functionality, and behavior of the clan using various modules. Modify the parameters to customize the clan to your needs and preferences.

Select the appropriate section for configuration.

transfer.description: This is the process of transferring control and responsibility for the clan from one member to another.

manage.description: Creating and deleting clans is available to any user. However, you can configure certain roles or allow members to create/delete a clan with them.
manage.admin_have_rights: Default administrators have the right to manage clans

members_limit.description: These settings allow you to change the limit on the number of members who can join the clan.

clan.appearance: Settings allow clan members to manage various parameters such as clan avatar, banner, description, and color. Users can easily change these elements and customize them according to individual preferences and clan style. This allows for creating a unique and memorable appearance for the clan and contributes to community building.

channel.description: These settings allow you to configure the category in which clan channels will be created, as well as configure various permissions for clan members based on their rank.

options.name: Change the name of the channel
options.kickUser: Kick a member from the channel

category.name: Clans
category.for_create: Category in which channels will be created
category.not_set: Category for clan channels is not set, create a new one?

edit_limit.description: Maximum limit of channels for creation

name_pattern.description: **Clan name pattern** is an established format or structure that needs to be followed when naming clans. This may include certain characters, words, or numbers that must be present in the clan name for consistency and ease of clan identification.

role.description: Settings allow you to create a role for the clan. If the setting is enabled, the role will be created, if disabled - the role will not be created.
role.allow: Create a role for the clan
role.footer: Be careful with this setting, when changing the clan role status, clans are immediately created or deleted

ad.description: Clan advertising settings allow you to choose a channel for advertising, enable or disable advertising, and set a delay before sending advertising.

commands.description: Command settings allow administrators to determine the delay of command usage, set a hidden message, adjust the visibility of the response, as well as manage the display of command usage. This allows to personalize user experience and ensure more efficient interaction with the bot.

cooldown.description: Delay settings include an option to set a time delay for using a command and the type of delay.

commands.ephemeral: This setting allows you to choose how the bot's response is displayed: as a hidden message or visible. You can configure it so that responses are visible to everyone or hidden from other chat participants.
commands.usage: The display settings of using a command allow you to configure how the user's actions are displayed when using the command. The user can choose to make their actions visible to all chat participants or keep them hidden.
commands.reply: Bot response settings for command usage allow you to choose whether the bot will respond to commands entered by the user. The user can configure the bot to respond to commands or remain silent.

afk.description: Settings for moving users to the AFK channel after a certain time allow administrators to set automatic moving of users if they show no activity within a certain time interval.
afk.channels: Channels from which the movement will take place
afk.roles: Roles that will be ignored during movement

activity.description: Participant activity settings may include the ability to customize text and voice activity.

xp.description: Assign experience and levels when they send messages or talk in voice channels.

formula.description: You can set the formula by which the level of each member will be calculated
formula.label: Formula

rewards.description: These roles will be automatically assigned to the player upon reaching a certain level.

xp.text_give: Select the amount of experience per message in minutes
xp.voice_give: Select the amount of experience per minute in the voice channel

mun.description: Configuring the function of managing participants' nicknames in a specific channel using roles and permissions will help ensure control and security in your community or workspace.

roles: This role will manage the roles you choose.

qa.description: The 'Question-Answer' function allows participants to ask questions and receive answers from staff. Users can ask any questions on various topics, and you will try to provide the most appropriate and informative answers to these questions.

styles.f: Short date and time format (07 September 2020 14:00)
styles.F: Long date and time format (Monday, September 07, 2020 14:00)

error.min_cooldown: You cannot set a delay less than `{cooldown}`
error.afk_min_max: Cannot set delay less than {min} and greater than {max}
error.xp_give_less_zero: Experience amount cannot be less than 0
error.xp_give_from_to: The amount of experience TO cannot be less than FROM
error.mun_missing_channel: Unable to send interface, channel is not established

banner_graph_min_max.x: Cannot set X coordinates less than {min} and greater than {max}
banner_graph_min_max.y: Cannot set Y coordinates less than {min} and greater than {max}
banner_graph_min_max.scale: The scale cannot be set less than {min} and greater than {max}
